mapper.select: SELECT a.authority_id, a.authority, a.`status`, m.*, rp.role_id, rp.expire_time FROM base_authority_role AS rp INNER JOIN base_authority AS a ON rp.authority_id = a.authority_id INNER JOIN base_menu AS m ON a.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.authority_id, a.authority, rp.expire_time, 'role' as owner FROM base_authority_role AS rp INNER JOIN base_authority AS a ON rp.authority_id = a.authority_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND a.status = 1
